template.code_project_names: List of folder names identifying a (code) project
template.exclude_folder_names: List of folder names not to be searched.
template.folder_paths: List of paths to add icons to folders. System variables can be used with %VARIABLE_NAME%
template.icons_path: Path in which the icons and the associated configurations are saved.
template.copy_icon: True if the icons should be copied to the folder, otherwise false. Default: False
